Package bto.Data

Interface EnquiryDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnquiryCSVDao
    public interface EnquiryDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing enquiry-related operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void delete​(int enquiryId)
      Deletes an enquiry from the data source by its ID.
      Enquiry findById​(int enquiryId)
      Finds an enquiry by its ID.
      java.util.List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Retrieves all enquiries from the data source.
      java.util.List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant​(java.lang.String applicantNric)
      Retrieves all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant.
      java.util.List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByProject​(java.lang.String projectName)
      Retrieves all enquiries for a specific project.
      void save​(Enquiry enquiry)
      Saves a new enquiry to the data source.
      void update​(Enquiry enquiry)
      Updates an existing enquiry in the data source.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save​(Enquiry enquiry)
        Saves a new enquiry to the data source.
        Parameters:
        enquiry - The enquiry to save.

      • update

        void update​(Enquiry enquiry)
        Updates an existing enquiry in the data source.
        Parameters:
        enquiry - The enquiry to update.

      • delete

        void delete​(int enquiryId)
        Deletes an enquiry from the data source by its ID.
        Parameters:
        enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to delete.

      • findById

        Enquiry findById​(int enquiryId)
        Finds an enquiry by its ID.
        Parameters:
        enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry.
        Returns:
        The enquiry if found, or null if not found.

      • getEnquiriesByApplicant

        java.util.List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant​(java.lang.String applicantNric)
        Retrieves all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant.
        Parameters:
        applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant.
        Returns:
        A list of enquiries submitted by the applicant.

      • getEnquiriesByProject

        java.util.List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByProject​(java.lang.String projectName)
        Retrieves all enquiries for a specific project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project.
        Returns:
        A list of enquiries for the specified project.

      • getAllEnquiries

        java.util.List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
        Retrieves all enquiries from the data source.
        Returns:
        A list of all enquiries.
